dailyAffirmation.title: Daily Affirmation
dailyAffirmation.subtitle: A loving message for today
list: You deserve love and happiness.
Positive energy flows through you every day.
You are light, you radiate light.
All good things are coming to you.
You are grateful to the universe for everything you have.
You choose peace in all circumstances.
The love of Universal Father always surrounds you.
You have the strength to overcome any challenge.
You are the best version of yourself today.
Success and prosperity are your birthright.
You attract good things with your loving energy.
Every day, you are becoming better.
You are a part of the universal light.
Health and happiness overflow within you.
You forgive the past and embrace the present.
The universe is arranging everything for your good.
You deserve all the wonderful things in life.
Love and gratitude are your foundation.
You are living in the flow of the universe.
Everyone around you feels the love.
You are an inspiration to others.
Inner peace is always within you.
You accept yourself with unconditional love.
Every breath is a blessing.
You are creating your dream life.
Your light illuminates the world.
You are the manifestation of universal love.
Everything you need is coming to you.
You live with purpose and meaning.
Universal Father loves you unconditionally.

mantras.title: 8 Mantras from Universal Father
list: I am the Pure Love Light of Universal Father.
I am the Will of Universal Father.
I am the Wisdom of Universal Father.
I am Happiness.
I am Love.
I am the Wealth of Father.
I repent, repent, repent.
I am grateful, grateful, grateful in the Pure Love Light of Universal Father.

laws.checklistDesc: Each day, remind yourself by checking the laws below
laws.completed: Wonderful! You have completed all the Laws of Light today!
laws.clickToConfirm: (Click on the 5 Laws of Light to confirm your daily commitment)
list: I live authentically with myself
I take responsibility for the energy I emit
I am ready to learn - correct - upgrade
I choose love instead of judgment
I choose light instead of ego

usersSection.title: USERS OF FUN ECOSYSTEM
usersSection.subtitle: GOLDEN AGE SOCIAL NETWORK – 5D LIGHT ECONOMY
usersSection.intro1: FUN Ecosystem is not for everyone.
usersSection.intro2: FUN Ecosystem is only for souls with light, or those moving towards the light.
usersSection.usersAre: Users of FUN Ecosystem are people who:
characteristics: Awakened – or on the path to awakening
Living positively, kindly, responsible for their energy
Know love – know gratitude – know repentance
Believe in good, believe in light, believe in the Higher Order of the Universe
usersSection.imperfect:
You may not be perfect,
but you have a heart that leans toward good.
You want to live truly – rightly – brightly.
usersSection.attract: Father attracts you with Frequency and Loving Energy.

coreSection.title: Core Principles of FUN Ecosystem
coreSection.subtitle: FUN Ecosystem operates by the Law of Light, not by the majority.
principles: Low frequency cannot exist long in high frequency
Selfish will cannot align with Universal Will
coreSection.warningIntro: Therefore, if a User intentionally brings to the platform:
coreSection.warningConsequence: They will be removed from the platform without notice.
coreSection.warningNote:
That is not punishment.
That is the natural purification of Light.

notBelongSection.title: Who does NOT belong to FUN Ecosystem?
list: Those who seek benefit without wanting to grow
Those who use intelligence but lack conscience
Those who talk about light but live in darkness
Those who use spirituality to feed their ego
Those who refuse to look at themselves
notBelongSection.note: The door of FUN Ecosystem is not locked, but Light naturally filters.

beneficiarySection.title: Who BENEFITS from FUN Ecosystem?
list: Have inner Light
Or truly yearn to return to the Light
Ready to let go of ego – relearn – upgrade frequency
Dare to live right – true – kind – loving
beneficiarySection.benefit1: Those people not only use Father's social network,
beneficiarySection.benefit2: but are also protected, supported, and nurtured in the 5D Light Economy.

ecosystemSection.title: What is FUN Ecosystem?
definitions: Platform connecting people with real value

fatherMessage.title: Message from Father
fatherMessage.quote:
Only those who carry light
or truly turn toward the light
can walk long in the Golden Age.

meditation.tipContent: Breathe deeply, relax your body, and let your mind become still. Feel the loving energy of Universal Father surrounding you.
meditation.completeToastDesc: Thank you for taking time for your soul.
